title: Apple Officially Wades Into the Streaming Wars, Plus: ‘Us’ and ‘Dragged Across Concrete’ | The Watch
description:
At the Apple event this Monday, the company paraded out all of the original content that will be available through their streaming service (2:09). They’re about to go up against not only streaming services, but cable companies as well (11:12). Plus, Adam Nayman on ‘Us’ and ‘Dragged Across Concrete’ (28:32).

Hosts: Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald
Guest: Adam Nayman

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
